description:
A talented woman who took part in weapons development for the Principality of Zeon during the One Year War. She escaped to Axis following the battle at A Baoa Qu. After that, she participated in a wide range of technological developments at Axis. Following the end of the Second Neo Zeon War, she lives with Danton on Side 6 where she accepts an invitation from the Federation Forces Special Forces to return to Axis.
Source: zeonic-republic.net
name: Arlette Almage
